thread.title: PMQs LIVE: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn in talks at exact moment Article 50 triggered
thread.title_full: PMQs LIVE: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn in talks at exact moment Article 50 triggered

title: PMQs LIVE: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn in talks at exact moment Article 50 triggered
text:
PMQs LIVE: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn in talks at exact moment Article 50 triggered PMQs LIVE: Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn in talks at exact moment Article 50 triggered PMQS will see Theresa May in a tense exchange with Jeremy Corbyn today as Article 50 is officially triggered to start the Brexit countdown. PUBLISHED: 11:07, Wed, Mar 29, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:52, Wed, Mar 29, 2017 GETTY/EPA It is set to be a tense showdown as Theresa May triggers Article 50 
The Prime Minister signed the six-page document that takes the UK a historic step closer to leave the bloc just after 4.30pm yesterday. 
At the same time Mrs May comes to blows with Jeremy Corbyn for Prime Minister’s Questions, Britain’s ambassador to the EU will be hand delivering the Article 50 letter to European Council President Donald Tusk. 
And straight after PMQs Theresa May will will deliver a statement in the Commons to inform the nation Britain is on the road out of Brussels.
